Interface HtmlToMobiConverter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ExecOption
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AmazonHtmlToMobiConverter, CalibreHtmlToMobiConverter

    public interface HtmlToMobiConverter
extends ExecOption
    This interface provides the method signature for converting an HTML document to an eBook in Mobi-Format

      • convertToMobi

        File convertToMobi(File htmlFile)
        Converts an HTML document
        Parameters:
        htmlFile - a JDOM representation of the HTML document which will be converted from.
        Returns:
        Returns the Java File object of the already written output Mobi ebook file.
